I still get the issue on DevEdition (54.0b14) with the following STR:

1. Add the following line to the console log action:

   ```js
   await this.normandy.installAddon('https://github.com/Osmose/jsonfile-example/releases/download/v1/jsonfile-example.xpi');
   ```
2. Create a new console log action, filter expression `true`, any old message to log, and enable it.
3. Run the following in the Browser Console:

   ```js
   Cu.import('resource://shield-recipe-client/lib/RecipeRunner.jsm', {}).RecipeRunner.testRun("http://localhost:8000/api/v1")
   ```

@vng Do you still not see the issue? What Firefox version are you testing on?
